ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Beryl A. MacDonald ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. BERYL A. MACDONALD, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia (Family Division), effective December 1, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
